title: Stage1 EDA: Microscope image types clustering
description: This notebook provides additional information about stage1_train dataset that should help to balance into train/valid for cross-validation. It starts from this interesting thread about image types. Group A are histological slides, group B are fluorescent images, and group C are bright-field images. It can complete this other kernel. It looks we have the following breakdown:  fluorescent: 81.5% histological: 16.1% bright-field: 2.4%
description_lemmatized: notebook provides additional information stage1_train dataset help balance trainvalid crossvalidation start interesting thread image type group histological slide group b fluorescent image group c brightfield image complete kernel look following breakdown fluorescent 815 histological 161 brightfield 24
